name: Horse
abilities: Heightened Senses: Increased hearing and smell make it almost impossible to stealthily attack or hide from this creature. Effects of Blind are halved.
Quadruped: Travels on all fours, doubling land speed. A disabled limb counts as a disabled arm AND leg.
Fight or Flight: Prioritizes escape once HP is reduced to 90% or below, only fighting in self-defense if escape is not an option.
